error.RT-SORT-LIMIT-EXCEEDED: Warning: sort limit exceeded, dropping points
error.RT-TIME-OUT-OF-ORDER: Warning: out-of-order assignment of time {{info.badTime}} after {{info.goodTime}}, point(s) dropped
error.RT-TOO-MANY-LOGS-WARNING: Warning: too many logs from {{info.host}}, throttling
error.RT-POINT-MISSING-TIME: Warning: point is missing a time in {{info.field}}
error.RT-TIMELESS-POINTS: Warning: encountered point(s) without the time field
error.RT-NO-FREE-TEXT: Error: Free text search is not implemented in this context.
error.RT-FREE-TEXT-STOCHASTIC: Error: Free text search is not implemented for stochastic adapter.
error.RT-INVALID-JSON-TIME-ERROR: Error: the time field must contain a number or a string representing time.
error.RT-INTEGER-REQUIRED-ERROR: Error: {{info.argument}} for {{info.procName}} must be an integer
error.RT-BATCH-INTERVAL-ERROR: Error: batch interval must be a positive number or duration.
error.RT-BATCH-INTERVAL-EVERY-ERROR: Error: Specify either batch -every or batch :interval:
error.RT-REDUCE-EVERY-ERROR: Error: reduce -every must be a positive duration.
error.RT-REDUCE-DELTA-ERROR: Error: delta cannot be used with reduce (use reduce last | put delta=delta())
error.RT-LAST-FROM-TO-ERROR: Error: -last option should not be combined with -from or -to
error.RT-MISSING-TIME-RANGE-ERROR: Error: One of -from, -to, or -last must be specified to define a query time range
error.RT-FORGET-BY-ERROR: Error: -forget option only applies when using "by"
error.RT-TO-BEFORE-FROM-MOMENT-ERROR: Error: -to must not be earlier than -from
error.RT-PACE-EVERY-X-ERROR: Error: Specify either output period with -every or time speedup with -x
error.RT-EMIT-TO-LIMIT-ERROR: Do not specify both -limit and -to or -last
error.RT-EMIT-POINTS-ARRAY-ERROR: emit -points wants an array of points
error.RT-EMIT-MIXED-POINTS-ERROR: emit -points must all have timestamps or have no timestamps
error.RT-EMIT-POINTS-FROM-ERROR: emit -points must not have timestamps when -from or -every is specified
error.RT-DURATION-OR-MOMENT-ERROR: Error: -{{info.option}} wants a duration or moment, got {{info.value}}
error.RT-INVALID-OFFSET-ERROR: Error: a duration is required for the offset.
error.RT-INVALID-SINK-OPTIONS-ERROR: Error: {{info.procName}} called with non-object argument to -o/-options
error.RT-JOIN-INPUTNUM-ERROR: Error: -{{info.option}} must be an input number (1, 2, ...).
error.RT-JOIN-ALL-TABLES-ERROR: Error: at least one input must not be a table
error.RT-JOIN-TABLE-OUTER-ERROR: -table and -outer cannot be specified for the same input
error.RT-JOIN-ZIP-ERROR: Error: -zip must be either true or a Duration.
error.RT-JOIN-ZIP-NEAREST-ERROR: Error: You cannot specify both -zip and -nearest.
error.RT-INVALID-MARKOV-ITEMS: Error: Markov items must all be numbers or all be strings
error.JUTTLE-RUNAWAY-PROGRAM: Not starting program as it would run forever with no output. {{info.extra}}
error.JUTTLE-DROPPED-TOPO: 'dropped' source must be followed by a linear topology
error.RT-PROGRAM-WITHOUT-FLOWGRAPH: Error: Cannot run a program without a flowgraph.
error.RT-PROC-CANNOT-START-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {{info.proc}} cannot be used at the start of a flowgraph.
error.RT-PROC-MUST-START-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {{info.proc}} can only be used at the start of a flowgraph.
error.RT-PROC-CANNOT-END-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {{info.proc}} cannot be used at the end of a flowgraph.
error.RT-PROC-MUST-END-FLOWGRAPH: Error: {{info.proc}} can only be used at the end of a flowgraph.
error.RT-WRONG-PROC-TYPE: Error: {{info.proc}} is a not a {{info.type}} proc.
error.RT-CANNOT-USE-AS-VARIABLE: Error: Cannot use a {{info.thing}} as a variable
error.RT-NON-TOPLEVEL-EXPORT: Error: Cannot export from within a {{info.context}}
error.RT-NON-TOPLEVEL-IMPORT: Error: Cannot import from within a {{info.context}}
error.RT-REDUCER-TOPLEVEL-STATEMENT: Error: Cannot use {{info.thing}} at the top level of a reducer.
error.RT-NOT-EXPORTED: Error: {{info.thing}} '{{info.name}}' is not exported by module {{info.module}}
error.RT-WRONG-ARG-COUNT-SINGULAR: Error: {{info.type}} {{info.name}} expects 1 argument but was called with {{info.actual_count}}
error.RT-WRONG-ARG-COUNT-PLURAL: Error: {{info.type}} {{info.name}} expects {{info.expected_count}} arguments but was called with {{info.actual_count}}
error.RT-WRONG-ARG-COUNT-RANGE: Error: {{info.type}} {{info.name}} expects {{info.min_count}} to {{info.max_count}} arguments but was called with {{info.actual_count}}
error.RT-ET-BAD-OPERAND: Error: The "{{info.operator}}" operator: {{info.side}} operand must be computable at compile-time.
error.RT-ET-BAD-FORMAT-1: Error: The "{{info.operator}}" operator: Must be in format "field {{info.operator}} expression".
error.RT-ET-BAD-FORMAT-2: Error: The "{{info.operator}}" operator: Must be in format "field {{info.operator}} expression" or "expression {{info.operator}} field".
error.RT-VARIABLE-NOT-ASSIGNABLE: Error: Variable "{{info.name}}" cannot be assigned to
error.RT-REDUCER-METHOD-ARGS: Error: Reducer method {{info.name}}() may not take arguments
error.RT-INVALID-POSTFIX-USE: Error: Invalid use of postfix operator {{info.operator}} with variable "{{info.variable}}"
error.RT-INVALID-POSTFIX-LHS: Error: Invalid left-hand side expression in postfix operation
error.RT-INVALID-PREFIX-USE: Error: Invalid use of prefix operator {{info.operator}} with variable "{{info.variable}}"
error.RT-PARAM-ORDER: Error: A required parameter cannot follow an optional parameter.
error.RT-BAD-INPUT-OPTION: Error: input {{info.input}} option {{info.option}} cannot be evaluated
error.RT-PROC-NEEDS-ARG: Error: The {{info.name}} processor needs an argument
error.RT-PROC-AFTER-SINK: Error: {{info.proc}} may not come after a sink
error.RT-PROC-BEFORE-SOURCE: Error: {{info.proc}} may not come before a source
error.RT-SUB-INVALID-ARG: Error: Subgraph {{info.sub}} called with invalid argument {{info.arg}}
error.RT-INVALID-OPERAND-TYPE: Error: The "{{info.operator}}" operator: Invalid operand type ({{info.type}}).
error.RT-IMPORT-INTERPOLATION: Error: Cannot use interpolation in imported module name.
error.RT-FIELD-NOT-STRING: Error: field {{info.field}} is not a string
error.RT-INVALID-OPTION-VALUE: Error: Invalid {{info.option}} option value, must be one of the following: {{info.supported}}
error.RT-INVALID-VIEW: Error: program refers to invalid client view "{{info.view}}"
error.RT-OPTION-SHOULD-BE-POSITIVE-INTEGER: Error: option {{info.option}} should be a positive integer
error.RT-INVALID-OPTION-COMBINATION: Error: option {{info.option}} can only be used with {{info.rule}}
